item.title: Coldplay - Adventure of A Lifetime
item.description: My very first big project. I started on the project by doing some lookdev work on different assets: vegetation and music instruments. I was in charge of lighting most of the shots in the jungle path sequence. Mathematic was still a small studio, making a 5 minutes in full CG in less than 4 months was challenging. The set dressing has been made in a way to make the jungle dense.

item.title: Commercial
item.description: Selection of project when I used to work on commercial in Paris Total - Les Voyageurs de l’espace Your browser doesn't support embedded videos, but don't worry, you can download it and watch it with your favorite video player!
